snippet: “Sure Sure Davi Det Hompson: 1976-1995” is a mini-retrospective of the Fluxus text and mail artist, who died in 1996.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews Davi Het Hompson mini-retrospective, Sure Sure Davi Det Hompson: 1976-1995, at ZieherSmith gallery; Hompson is nom d'art for late David E Thompson.
lead_paragraph: “Sure Sure Davi Det Hompson: 1976-1995” is a mini-retrospective of the Fluxus text and mail artist, who died in 1996.

headline.print_headline: Davi Det Hompson: ‘Sure Sure Davi Det Hompson: 1976-1995’
